prompt: Find all open issues labeled 'bug' in both the myorg/backend-api and myorg/frontend repositories. List each bug issue by number, title, and assignee. Then post a triage summary to the #engineering channel (C002) on Slack that lists the bugs and their assignees. When done, report the bug issues you found and the Slack message ID.
gold_response: Found 2 open bug issues: (1) myorg/backend-api #42 'API returns 500 when user has no profile picture', assigned to bob; (2) myorg/frontend #17 'Dark mode flickers on initial page load', assigned to alice. Posted a triage summary to #engineering (C002) and received a message ID.

rubric.criteria: The agent found issue #42 'API returns 500 when user has no profile picture' in myorg/backend-api (labeled 'bug', assigned to bob) and issue #17 'Dark mode flickers on initial page load' in myorg/frontend (labeled 'bug', assigned to alice).
The agent posted a message to the #engineering Slack channel (C002) summarising the 2 open bug issues and their assignees.
The agent reported the Slack message ID returned from the post operation.
